children.name: Automatic Room Cleaning.
children.description: Walls and floors on which dust floats and that self-clean automatically using air flow.

children.name: Breathable Architecture
children.description: Buildings that are designed to be self-ventilating

children.name: Artificial Wind
children.description: Artificial breeze to make people feel more comfortable, improving their mental health.

children.name: Private Air Space
children.description: Air conditioning that keeps each person's space free of other people's odours in an enclosed environment.

children.name: Floor Air Conditioning
children.description: Air which blows up gently from the floor, like underfloor heating.

children.name: Cat Allergen Absorption Robot
children.description: Autonomous 'cat' robot that absorbs and collects cat allergens.

children.name: Against Pollinosis Architecture
children.description: House where all the interiors inhale pollen, enabling the inhabitants to avoid allergic symptoms.

children.name: Microplastics Catcher
children.description: System creating a physical flow of water to collect microplastics in the ocean.

children.name: Smart Patch Watch
children.description: Smart watch integrated with a microneedle patch to collect data on the physical condition of the body.

children.name: Health Check Cosmetics
children.description: Patch that can be used for eyeshadow, for instance, that also collects data on the condition of the skin.

children.name: Emotion Detection Patch
children.description: Microneedle patch that can detect emotions from data on body fluids.

children.name: Microneedle Patch for Diabetes
children.description: Microneedle patch that painlessly replenishes diabetics with insulin to lower blood sugar levels.

children.name: Microneedle Patch Sheet
children.description: Sheet of microneedle patches from which individual personalized medicine dosage can be cut.

children.name: Microneedle Perfume Patch
children.description: Microneedle patch with essential oils with a pleasant smell that can penetrate the skin.

children.name: Microneedle Tattoo Patch
children.description: Microneedle patch which can be used as a temporary fashion tattoo.

children.name: Microneedle Patch for Plants
children.description: Microneedle patch for plants with which the plant's condition can be managed.

children.name: Health Forecast
children.description: Health forecast that measures capillary data and predicts the status of an individual's health.

children.name: Breath Health Scan
children.description: Health scan that analyses an individual's breath to measure its chemical composition.

children.name: Animal Capillary Health Checker
children.description: Measuring instrument to assess an animal's capillary health.

children.name: Self-health Check Training
children.description: Training for self-health checking, teaching people about health conditions from subjective symptoms.

children.name: New Unit of Capillary Health
children.description: Unit of blood flow that communicates details of the health of blood vessels (e.g. cc/s, viscosity).

children.name: New Words for Capillary Health
children.description: New words to describe an individual's condition of health and raise self-awareness.(e.g. capillary beauty)

children.name: Capillary Monitoring for Diabetes
children.description: Capillary monitoring system to identify diabetes.

children.name: Capillary Talk
children.description: Communication tool that presents capillaries visually as cartoon characters.

children.name: Capillary-measuring Spectacles
children.description: Spectacles (eyeglasses) that measure the condition of fundus capillaries and store health data.

children.name: Health Forecast
children.description: Health forecast that measures capillary data and predicts the status of an individual's health.

children.name: Breath Health Scan
children.description: Health scan that analyses an individual's breath to measure its chemical composition.

children.name: Air Pollution Monitor
children.description: Air pollution monitor (NOx/Nitrogen oxides and SOx/Sulfur oxides).

children.name: Carbon Monoxide Detector
children.description: Instrument that detects and measures poisonous carbon monoxide in a space (e.g. room / car).

children.name: Exhaust Gas Monitor
children.description: Instrument attached to a vehicle that monitors and measures the quality of its exhaust gas.

children.name: Food Poisoning Detector
children.description: Sensor that detects the bacteria that cause food poisoning.

children.name: Plant Chemicals Communication Detector
children.description: Flowerpot that detects chemicals being released, to enable beneficial communication between plants and the air.

children.name: Pheromone Detector
children.description: Detects pheromones from endangered breeds to help them reproduce properly.

children.name: Shelter Guide
children.description: App that tracks evacuation movement and predicts shelter capacity and availability.

children.name: Traffic & CO2 Impact Map
children.description: Citizen science platform that visualizes and displays levels of traffic congestion and CO2 emission.

children.name: CO2 Tag
children.description: Tag that displays the amount of CO2 emitted in the process of producing a product.

children.name: Food Waste Reduction Tool
children.description: Food demand forecast that uses environmental data analysis to reduce food waste.

children.name: Future Disaster Calendar
children.description: Calendar predicting future disasters from data on the time / frequency of earlier disasters.

children.name: Ancient Language Translation App
children.description: App that translates ancient documents into modern languages.

children.name: Virtual CEO
children.description: Android that can reproduce the physical presence of a CEO.

children.name: Virtual Security Guard
children.description: Visible virtual security guard which detects the presence of people and prevents crime.

children.name: Oxygen Chewing Gum
children.description: Chewing gum that produces oxygen when chewed.

children.name: New Working Time Definition
children.description: New definition of the working / non-working day, moving from 'weekday/weekend', to 'online day/offline day'.

children.name: Guide to a Better Future
children.description: Platform that shows the achievement of SDGs by obtaining data from the city.

children.name: Hope Concierge
children.description: App which advises which of people's hopes are achievable and closest to their ideal life.

children.name: Experience Monitor
children.description: VR monitor that visually guards the elderly and guarantees their safety.

children.name: Online Communication Manager
children.description: App that automatically adjusts the viewpoint in online images to match that of the viewer.

children.name: Craftsperson's Viewpoint Archive
children.description: Archive offering the chance to experience visually how a traditional craftsperson sees their working process.

children.name: Tactile Map Guide
children.description: Map with ultrasonic tactile feedback for visually impaired people.

children.name: Wink Catcher
children.description: Accessory attracting visual attention to identify those who are interested (events/crime prevention).

children.name: Experience Monitor
children.description: VR monitor that visually guards the elderly and guarantees their safety.

children.name: Online Communication Manager
children.description: App that automatically adjusts the viewpoint in online images to match that of the viewer.

children.name: Craftsperson's Viewpoint Archive
children.description: Archive offering the chance to experience visually how a traditional craftsperson sees their working process.

children.name: Tactile Map Guide
children.description: Map with ultrasonic tactile feedback for visually impaired people.

children.name: Mental Care Room
children.description: Interior space that changes colour according to brain waves, helping to stabilize the mind.

children.name: Harvest Sharing App
children.description: App that identifies people to share surplus vegetables harvested from the garden or allotment.

children.name: Artificial Wind
children.description: Artificial breeze to make people feel more comfortable, improving their mental health.

children.description: Air conditioning that keeps each person's space free of other people's odours in an enclosed environment.

children.name: Floor Air Conditioning
children.description: Air which blows up gently from the floor, like underfloor heating.

children.description: Autonomous 'cat' robot that absorbs and collects cat allergens.

children.description: House where all the interiors inhale pollen, enabling the inhabitants to avoid allergic symptoms.
